definition: warm/lukewarm/temperature/to warm up/mild/soft/tender/to review (a lesson etc)/fever (TCM)/old variant of 瘟[wen1]
cloth/to declare/to announce/to spread/to make known

to scale (a height)/to ascend/to mount/to publish or record/to enter (e.g. in a register)/to press down with the foot/to step or tread on/to put on (shoes or trousers) (dialect)/to be gathered and taken to the threshing ground (old)

pinyin: Wen1 bu4 er3 deng1 Wang3 qiu2 Gong1 kai1 sai4

sentences.english: I feel deeply honored to be playing against the former Wimbledon Champion.
sentences.chinese: 能與溫布爾登前冠軍球手比賽，我深感榮幸。

sentences.english: Wimbledon is the only Grand Slam to still be played on grass.
sentences.chinese: 溫布爾登是唯一的草地大滿貫。

sentences.english: June also sees the start of the Wimbledon tennis tournament.
sentences.chinese: 溫布爾登網球錦標賽也在六月開賽。

sentences.english: Summer is not summer in Britain without the Wimbledon Tennis Championships.
sentences.chinese: 沒有溫布爾登網球賽的英國夏天，可謂不算是夏天。

sentences.english: My eyes were opened when I visited this year's Wimbledon.
sentences.chinese: 今年的溫布爾登之行使我重開眼界。

sentences.english: I felt deeply honoured to be playing against the former Wimbledon Champion.
sentences.chinese: 能與溫布爾登網球的前冠軍球手比賽，我深感榮幸。

sentences.english: I started out in South London, Wimbledon.
sentences.chinese: 我最早居住在倫敦南部的溫布爾登。

sentences.english: I felt deeply honored to be playing against the former Wimbledon Champion.
sentences.chinese: 能與溫布爾登前冠軍球手比賽，我身感榮幸。

sentences.english: I remember Schmeichel screaming like a pig for more protection when we played Wimbledon when he first came here.
sentences.chinese: 我記得舒梅切爾剛來打溫布爾登的時候也是怯生生的。

sentences.english: This whole town is gearing up for Wimbledon tennis.
sentences.chinese: 整個城市都準備着迎接溫布爾登網球公開賽。

sentences.english: How many times did Alex get through to the finals of the men's singles at Wimbledon?
sentences.chinese: 阿力克斯幾次進入溫布爾登男子網球單打決賽？
